content: side line scarf knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2023 all rights reserved pattern contents photo & yarn used page 1 knitting pattern page 2 contact info page 2 yarn used lion brand wool-ease thick & quick super bulky color fisherman #99 side line scarf - knitting pattern design by fifty four ten studio © 2023 skill level - beginner / easy yarn suggestions size - approximately 7 wide x 62 long or desired length this pattern is desig ned for super bulky weight supplies yarn on yarn label look  super bulky #6 weight yarn 180 - 200 yards for the 6 symbol  us size 13 or 15 knitting needles - straight or circular click to learn more about these yarns or size best suited for your yarn & knitting gauge lion brand wool-ease thick & quick  tapestry needle lion brand hometown gauge* see more options on my website super bulky yarns for knitting garter stitch with us 13 or 15 needles about 8 5 sts = 4 *gauge does not have to be exact however stitch pattern will look best with fairly tight stitches abbreviations directions k knit with us size 13 or 15 needles cast on 15 sts work as follows p purl st stitch row 1 *k3 p3 repeat from * end k3 sts stitches row 2 same as row 1 the pattern is made up of these 2 row repeat row 1 and 2 until scarf is 62 long or desired length bind off in stitch pattern when work is desired length cut yarn leaving an 8 tail with a tapestry needle carefully weave in ends modifications this pattern may be modified for different weight yarns change number of stitches cast on to suit gauge and desired scarf width to change the number of stitches cast on multiply as follows 3 x any odd number = number of stitches to cast on to adapt for bulky #5 weight yarn 3 x 7 = 21 stitches or 3 x 9 = 27 stitches if you have questions contact mary lee at fiftyfourtenstudio@gmail com see my collection of knitting patterns fiftyfourtenstudio com shop all of my knitting patterns on ravelry bit ly/5410studioravelry most of my knitting patterns are also available on etsy sign up for my email newsletter here bit ly/5410studionewslettersignup follow me on facebook and instagram @fiftyfourtenstudio all content and photographs are the property of fifty four ten studio and may not be used without express permission pattern may not be resold copied or redistributed for any reason via hard copy email or internet posting this pattern may be used for personal use charity knitting or small scale craft sales 2
